alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Knox; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 11:17PM EDT until August 06 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM EDT FOR KNOX...MARTIN AND DAVIESS COUNTIES... At 1117 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Shoals to near Vincennes, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Vincennes, Washington, Shoals, Bicknell, Loogootee, Odon, Elnora, Oaktown, Monroe City, Wheatland, Bruceville, Plainville, Sandborn, Montgomery, Edwardsport, Decker, Crane, Cannelburg, Alfordsville and West Boggs Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for south central and southwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
